case.title: Mutually beneficial foot fun - 35 (Manhattan)
case.text: Hello I'm a submissive guy, 35, with a foot fetish looking to meet dominant, bossy girls who would need Roses$$ and, in exchange, I would like to be bossed around and be ordered to lick and smell your sweaty feet. I'm looking for the right girl who wants a slave to use for her needs on a regular basis. If interested put Feet in subject line and a little about how we can work this out.
